Dear Sir
You will have to come down to my country to inspect the property and sign
document involved
or  i get you a good lawyer to represent you here until the deal is done
Call me + 233 240047949
Thanks
*GLOBAL SECURITY COMPANY*
*Officer in Charge: *
*Mr Patrick Smith *
